devdoc.author: Julien Niset - <julien@argent.im>
devdoc.details: Basic implementation of a Resolver. The contract defines a manager role who is the only role that can add a new name to the list of resolved names.

addr(bytes32).details: Gets the address associated to an ENS node.
addr(bytes32).return: the address of the target node.

changeOwner(address).details: Lets the owner transfer ownership of the contract to a new owner.

name(bytes32).details: Gets the name associated to an ENS node.
name(bytes32).return: the name of the target ENS node.

setAddr(bytes32,address).details: Lets the manager set the address associated with an ENS node.

setName(bytes32,string).details: Lets the manager set the name associated with an ENS node.

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Returns true if the resolver implements the interface specified by the provided hash.

params._interfaceID: The ID of the interface to check for.

supportsInterface(bytes4).return: True if the contract implements the requested interface.

devdoc.title: ArgentENSResolver
